dmca.title: FW: DMCA Violation
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: collin@xenosinteractive.com [mailto:collin@xenosinteractive.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, November 16, 2006 10:53 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: FW: DMCA Violation
Subject: RE: FW: DMCA Violation


Sorry about that, here are the requirements:

   1.  My signature is attached to this email.
   2. The copyrighted work that has been infringed is the design of the
website, www.daddygoldbucks.com, the logo on each page, and all design
elements within the site
   3. The copyrighted work that has been infringed is the design of the
website, www.daddygoldbucks.com, the logo on each page, and all design
elements within the site. This material should be removed at once
   4. My contact information is as follows:
Collin Kemble
14663 Las Flores Dr.
Dallas, TX 75254
469-438-8862
collin@xenosinteractive.com
   5. I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, myself, or the
law; and
   6. I certify that the information in the notification is accurate,
and under penalty of perjury, that I am the owner of an exclusive right
that is allegedly infringed.


> -------- Original Message --------
> Subject: FW: DMCA Violation
> From: "Copyright" <Copyright@theplanet.com>
> Date: Thu, November 16, 2006 8:46 am
> To: <collin@xenosinteractive.com>
> Cc: <Theplanet@chillingeffects.org>
> 
>      
>  To Whom It May Concern:   Please note that below-referenced copyright
infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required
notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998
("DMCA").   Please note that we have not passed on the substantive
merits of your claim.   Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.   Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. 
> 
>   From: Collin Kemble [mailto:collin@xenosinteractive.com]
> Posted At: Wednesday, November 15, 2006 7:39 PM Posted To: Copyright
> Conversation: DMCA Violation
> Subject: DMCA Violation
> 
>  
> Hello,
> One of your customers with the domain name, daddygoldbucks.com, and ip
address of  70.87.140.170 is currently displaying my copyrighted
materials without my permission. The materials in question are the
website design itself and the logo which were all created and
copyrighted by myself. Please let me know what I need to do to file a
DMCA takedown notice with your company. 
>   
> I can be reached at 469-438-8862.  
>   
> Best regards,
> Collin
